local_intent: Close the gripper on the grape bunch and verify a stable grasp, using fallback perception if grapes are not visible.
assumptions: Arm is already aligned near the grapes and contact has been established
Gripper is open and positioned to grasp
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp step surrounding CloseGripper in GLOBAL_BT: perceive grapes if needed, close gripper, then verify stability.
